overview: Maurizio Sturlesi is a senior manager and software architect with a proven track record in software architectures, development and consulting. Maurizio has over 16 years experience delivering complex telecoms software solutions for leading solutions providers. Prior to joining Amartus, Maurizio was Consulting Manager & Senior Consultant with Orbism Ltd, a leading Irish consultancy firm in emerging technologies. There he worked directly with the CEO on new business development and played a key role in technical analysis & delivery of software solutions to a number of clients. Prior to Orbism, Maurizio was employed with Marconi Ireland, where he worked with Michael and Richard for several years. In Marconi, Maurizio held several senior technical positions, including the technical leadership of their Network Management Alarm Manager Component. Maurizio graduated in 1995 from the University of Milan with a BSc (Hons) in Computer Science
